label: SpecifiedCertificate
comment: A document issued by a government, public organization or association to certify a property of a person, entity, process or object.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying an alias name of this specified certificate.
A distinct article or provision in a document, which requires compliance.
A geographic region, expressed as text, applicable for this specified certificate.
A code specifying an assurance level of this specified declaration.
A code specifying an available language for this specified certificate.
A capability level, expressed as text, for this specified experience item.
Anything that is visible or tangible,Â such as a product, process, or organization.
The date, time, date time, or other date time value from which this specified certificate is effective.
An endorsement date, time, date time or other date time value for this specified certificate.
A reference to a physical location or place.
A party that issues this specified declaration.
A latest endorsement date, time, date time or other date time value for this specified certificate.
An identifier of a party for this specified certificate.
The information relevant to a condition related to a document.
The indication of whether or not this specified certificate is required.
The indication of whether or not this specified certificate is valid.
A date, time, date time or other date time value until which this specified certificate will remain valid under the terms of an approved extension period.
A code specifying a type of validity for this specified certificate.
